component.name: org.nuxeo.ecm.core.cache.CacheService
component.documentation: Service providing a unified cache management system.

extension-point.name: caches
extension-point.documentation:
Extension Point to define a new cache .
20
The default implementation is based on Google Guava implementation that does not support distributed cache You can use the 'type=RedisCache' for the implementation on top of redis that allow distributed cache (make sure that a contrib to RedisService define a redis server) You can also create your own implementation by extending the AsbtractCache class and then use it as an implementation class
The Time To Live define in minutes the time before the cache will be destroyed
The max size set the max number of elements contained in the cache
The concurrency level, number of thread that can access at the same time the cache
